name: Vitality: A Game about Life and Death
name_original: Vitality: A Game about Life and Death
description:
Please download and play the Windows build if possible as it offers the best experience.

If you are playing on itch.io, please make sure you play the game in fullscreen mode.

Controls:

[Up Arrow] [Down Arrow]: Amplitude

[Left Arrow] [Right Arrow]: Frequency

[Space]: Movement

Made by Billy and Matt

Music by Ned Jacobs

For GGJ 2022
